Observed at: North Mountain 2:00 AM ADT Wednesday 3 May 2023

Dewpoint: -0.9°C

Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain changing to periods of light snow or ice pellets overnight. Risk of freezing rain over the Highlands late this evening and after midnight. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 9:26 PM ADT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late in the morning then cloudy. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 9:26 PM ADT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 9:26 PM ADT Tuesday 2 May 2023
